name: Whack Red White
description:
Take a part in a defining moment of history.  Lead The Revolution Movement and defeat the last Generals of The Old Order or - do the just the opposite – repel attack of  subversives and save future generations  from an anger of the proletariat!

There are 24 Revolutionists' and 2 White Generals' tokens. The board consists of a grid forming 33 intersection points (spots). The goal of Revolutionists is to occupy the Palace (cover all 9 spots in the red grid section), capture the two Generals or surround them leaving no space to make a move. 

The goal of Generals is to capture at least 18 Revolutionists’ tokens or unable them to occupy the Palace.
